Text.Page:
Thulsa has pulled in troops from all over to protect his ugly skin.

His Ebon Tower shamans, Ebon Tower guards, arachnen painspinners, and anguish fiends are all reinforcements from other battlefields.

He's at the end of his reserves. Kill them off!
Fantastic! If you aren't blessed by Kaia, I don't know who is.
If showing compassion to servants of evil is the virtuous path, I choose the path of the wicked!
